name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Monstera Deliciosa is a popular indoor plant known for its large, glossy leaves with natural splits. It thrives in bright, indirect light and adds a tropical vibe to any space.

name: Snake Plant
description: Snake Plants are low-maintenance and perfect for beginners. They help purify indoor air and can survive in low light with minimal watering.

name: Peace Lily
description: Peace Lilies are elegant plants known for their white blooms and air-purifying qualities. They prefer shaded areas and slightly moist soil.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is loved for its large violin-shaped leaves. It requires bright, indirect sunlight and careful watering to thrive indoors.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant known for its healing properties. It requires minimal watering and grows best in bright sunlight.

name: Spider Plant
description: Spider Plants are fast-growing indoor plants with arching leaves. They are easy to care for and great for improving air quality.
